ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Giant Grub Digger
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings ~Rolaleil Sorry to burst your bubble, but bards do not get an effective 2hs or 2hb. They can equip some weapons and can hit greens and see some nice
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings ~Rolaleil

Sorry to burst your bubble, but bards do not get an effective 2hs or 2hb.
They can equip some weapons and can hit greens and see some nice numbers
but.... blues and higher will skill check and you will not be able to hit
very well at all. Bardic losre says it's left over from beta days when
bards had 2hs and 2hb but it was taken away by simply capping the skills at
level 1.

Try smacking some blues - have Selos memmed though! Good luck, good hunting
and keep us posted on your adventures!

Sylly Songsynger
<The Pantheon>
Minstrel somewhere on Innoruuk...
http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly


----- Original Message -----
From: "Rolaleil LeLandont" <rolaleil@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 01, 2000 3:07 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Giant Grub Digger


> Hi!
>
> This guy just gave me a Giant Grub Digger (12dam/47dly, +20HP, +5
> SVDisease), *2HS* weapon that can be wielded by bards! Now, last
> time I visited the Bard Guild, my trainer didn't offer me 2hs as a
> skill, and I've always heard that 2HS is not available to bards
> anyway, YET I can and have wielded this thing! In truth, using this
> is not as effective as my Drachnid Leg Tip, but I think it's because
> Bards are NOT ABLE to increase their 2HS skill. Also, the only time
> I do any REAL damage (25-28 per hit!) is when I'm whistling the war
> song, otherwise I rarely hit above 10.
>
> Does anyone have any information on this? Have any bards been able
> to establish and improve a 2HS skill? If so, bards just got a GREAT
> soloing weapon!
>
> ~Rolaleil
> Bard of the 15th Song
> E'ci Server
>
